short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fill out the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission form.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of tediously clicking through the same U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) questions on every job application, ranging from citizenship, work authorization, sponsorship, gender, ethnicity, veteran status, disabilities, and sexual orientation?

This Chrome/Edge extension will fill them out automatically so you can save time and energy!

To use, simply fill out your personal information one more time in the extension's option page, and click the extension's icon when visiting a job application page to use!

Tested on greenhouse and jobs.lever boards.
